record.id: field.name="legacyid" and file.name="kmdocument" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: legacyid
record.file.name: kmdocument

brief.brief: The original ID of an imported document.
Valuable when importing new documents or updating existing documents.

On a document import, if no legacy id is specified, the imported document is created as a new document. If a legacyid is specified, however, the system checks for an existing document with the same legacy id. If it finds an existing document, the system updates the existing document with the imported information. Otherwise, a new document a created with that legacy id.
